feed.title: Building a node crawler to map network

entry.title: Building a node crawler to map network
entry.summary: The author of this message has found a helpful set of articles on the Dev & Tech forum that answers a question they had regarding the getaddr message. They provide some early results from running v0.0.0.0.0.0.0.0.1 for about an hour, which shows 19319 new nodes discovered, 754 contacted nodes, 3253 uncontactable nodes, and 9 limbo nodes. The total number of nodes is 23335, with about 5000 from initial IRC discover and the rest from getaddr. Additionally, they provide information on the versions and fails encountered during this time.
